definition: covering the whole land/over hills and dales
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time

sentences.english: After spring rain, colorful flowers bloomed all over the mountain. ?
sentences.chinese: 春雨過後，滿山遍野都開着五顏六色的花朵。

sentences.english: There are soybeans and sorghum all over the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 還有那滿山遍野的大豆高粱。

sentences.english: After the spring rain, flowers were blooming all over the hills in all colours.
sentences.chinese: 春雨過後，滿山遍野都開着五顏六色的花朵。

sentences.english: Numerous calls from the sky, the hillsides Huaihua open.
sentences.chinese: 千呼萬喚天上來，滿山遍野槐花開。

sentences.english: My family in the Northeast Songhua River, there has all over the soybean sorghum.
sentences.chinese: 我的家在東北松花江上啊，那裏有滿山遍野大豆高粱。

sentences.english: The plantations of Ceylon tea occupy vast spaces as far as the eye beholds.
sentences.chinese: 視野所及的地方是滿山遍野的錫蘭茶樹。

sentences.english: Soya beans and sorghum cover the hills and plains.
sentences.chinese: 還有那滿山遍野的大豆高粱。

definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
Garden of Many Flowers (name)/Baihua garden in Hongmiao village 洪廟村|洪庙村[Hong2 miao4 cun1], Shandong
Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
